mapper.insert: insert into news (newsname, title, category, date, url, content) values(#{newsname},#{title},#{category},#{date},#{url},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT p.name FROM province p INNER join sigungu s ON p.p_code=s.p_code WHERE s.name LIKE '%${s_name}%' and p.name LIKE '%${strFirst}%${strSecond}%'
SELECT s.name FROM province p INNER join sigungu s ON p.p_code=s.p_code WHERE p.name LIKE '%${strFirst}%${strSecond}%' limit 1
select count(p_code) from province where name like '%${strFirst}%${strSecond}%'
select count(s_code) from sigungu where name like '%${strFirst}%${strSecond}%'
mapper.insert: insert into contents set content=#{content}, p_name=#{p_name}, s_name=#{s_name}
mapper.select: select title from news order by date desc limit 10;
select title, date, content from news where title=#{title}
SELECT count(title) FROM news WHERE title LIKE '%${keyword}%'
